body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19792 (rpc: Add dumpcoinstats by fjahr)
* #19775 (test: Activate segwit in TestChain100Setup by MarcoFalke)
* #19652 (Add thread safety annotations to Mempool{Info}ToJSON() by hebasto)
* #19521 (Coinstats Index (without UTXO set hash) by fjahr)
* #19306 (refactor: Replace RecursiveMutex with Mutex in CTxMemPool by hebasto)
* #19245 ([WIP DONOTMERGE] Replace boost::filesystem with std::filesystem (in c++17) by kiminuo)
* #19145 (Add hash_type MUHASH for gettxoutsetinfo by fjahr)
* #18731 (refactor: Make CCheckQueue RAII-styled by hebasto)
* #18689 (rpc: allow dumptxoutset to dump human-readable data by pierreN)
* #14053 (Add address-based index (attempt 4?) by marcinja)
* #9384 (CCoinsViewCache code cleanup & deduplication by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).

<sub>Want to unsubscribe from rebase notifications on this pull request? Just convert this pull request to a "draft".</sub>
